title: Appreciation to whoever made The Princeling's Lament
body:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/shadow-isles#/the-princelings-lament?_k=nowvwc

Just wanted to say, this poem was absolutely AMAZING. The soundcloud voice over for this poem was even better, the way that it included most Shadow Isles Champions was simply stunning! When Kallista was summoned, I was genuinely shocked!

Overall, keep up the good work Riot! I love how you're introducing the lore nowadays and the aesthetics of the game lately!

replies.body: Glad you liked it!  There's gonna be a Q and A with all of the Shadow Isles writers on the league subreddit at 11 AM pacific time tomorrow -- you should come by and chat!
Its time like this i wish i was unemployed
This makes me just think, there is a new shadow isles champ coming soon. Just the feel of it
I agree, I thought this was a really cool and unique way to introduce some flavor for a champion. Well done!
